mapper.select: INSERT INTO T_BOARD (BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, USERID, BOARDMAIN, BOARDNOTICE, BOARDREGISTERDATE, BOARDUPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{userId}, #{boardMain}, #{boardNotice}, #{boardRegisterdate}, #{boardUpdatedate})
SELECT * FROM T_BOARD ORDER BY BOARDID DESC
SELECT * FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARDTITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY BOARDID DESC
SELECT * FROM T_BOARD WHERE USERID '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY BOARDID DESC
